name: ShopKeeller
description:
ShopKeeller is a single player shooter game, you play a client in a Supermarket that wants to get the best sales during the black friday.

There is also other clients that want to steal your items, to get rid of them you can use differents guns that can be found in the Supermarket.

The goal is to find 3 items and get out of the supermarket alive.

Write to Kill :

-The only way to kill ennemies is to write their names, so be fast and don't miss a letter. Ready ? WRITE !!!

Search items :

-Cross the supermarket looking for the uniques sold items and get them all.

The beautiful BLACK T-SHIRT

The blue diamond gloves

The original John  Snow socks 

ShopKeeller  is a student game created in a Game Jam organized by our school : IIM.

The development team members are :

Florian Ribeiro - Developer

Adrien Ribeiro - Developer

Dov Benzaquen- Developer

Julien Sadarnac - Game Designer

Enriqué Egido - Game Designer

Pierre-Louis Dulieu - Game Designer
